name: Crystal Pong (Leo_DB)
description:
Crystal Pong

Crystal Pong is a take on the well known Pong game.

In this game instead of scoring points by putting the ball behind your opponent, you have to destroy crystals which randomly appear on the screen, in order to inflict damage to your opponent.

Destroy 3 crystals and you score a point.

How To PLAY : 

Depending of where the ball hit you pad, the ball will be launch in a different direction : 

top -> upward

middle -> in front

bottom -> downward

/!\ If you are the player on the left side of the screen : the ball will destroy crystal for you if it move toward the right. /!\

Accordingly, the player on the right side of the screen will score if the ball move toward the left.

Controls :

Player vs AI :

Player 1 : Keyboard (UP/DOWN arrows to move, SPACE to serve)

Player vs Player :

Player 1 : Keyboard (UP/DOWN arrows to move, SPACE to serve)

Player 2 : GamePad (Left Joystick or DPad to move, A to serve)
